example.parse: (S-HLN (NP-TPC-1 (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM جامعة) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN المغتربين)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الانتشار))))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS ناشدت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-DTV (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_ACC المسؤولين)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC وضع) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حد)) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تدخل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN موظفين))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شؤون) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))))))

arg.g: to stop the employee intervention in her matters

example.arg: وضع حد ل تدخل موظفين في شؤونها
